item.title: Relaying SMTP via Gmail (or Google Apps) Using Postfix
item.description: Today I had the need to start relaying mail through my Google Apps account since Super-Evil-Bastard-ITSPRogers blocks sending email (it’s probably a good thing, however it’s quite annoying when running some services from home). Found this article while Googling, and it worked great first try. I like when things are this easy. http://www.zulius.com/how-to/set-up-postfix-with-a-remote-smtp-relay-host/
